Keywords: Armor , Future , Latveria , Mystical , Politician , Ruler , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
STARTING PLOT POINTS: 1
CONTINUITY: When Doom 2099, Revolutionary is KO'd, an opponent chooses a number of standard powers equal to your friendly characters on the map. Characters on your force can't use those powers until the end of your next turn.
(+0) DEPOSING TYGER WYLDE: FREE: Make an attack that deals 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage. If the attack hits, gain 1 plot point. If the attack hit the highest point (or tied) opposing character on the map, instead gain 3 plot points.
(-1) STEALING THE SHIPMENT AS PART OF THE ZEFIRO RESISTANCE: FREE: Choose an adjacent opposing character. If they aren't equipped, they modify defense -2 this turn. Otherwise, unequip that character's equipment.
(-7) ONE NATION UNDER DOOM: FREE: For the rest of the game, for each opposing character, the first time each turn that opposing character would be given a CLOSE, RANGE, MOVE, or POWER action, you may roll a d6. 3-6: That character can't be given that type of action that turn.

October 28, 2021
Hellboy the Bellboy
Just played him for the first time tonight. My rolls were mostly trash the whole evening but I have to say, play him with Alchemical Fire. Absolutely bananas.
July 15, 2021
jediknight52501
My first Title Character. Can't wait to try him out soon.
February 24, 2021
Goop
This is probably one of the best Title characters i've seen in a while. Being able to attack EVERY turn also meets the criteria of him needing to attack to not take 1 unavoidable from Title mechanic. You pull off his ultimate and its devastating. THIS is how Title pieces should be!
August 26, 2020
Slicktrickyrick
[QUOTE=The Singularity]Can the ONE NATION UNDER DOOM special power be rerolled?[/QUOTE]In modern age games, I don't believe there is a way, you can only re-roll attacks and breakaway with Probability Control. You could replace the dice roll in golden age games with smww 060 Mr. Mxyzptlk.
August 26, 2020
The Singularity
Can the [B]ONE NATION UNDER DOOM[/B] special power be rerolled?
August 20, 2020
Thorngren
Been away from this game for years but just came back when I saw this piece existed. Not how I would have done the dial (see my custom creations way back) but damn do I love this. Splurging and buying him online just to stick on my car dashboard and remind me of my favorite comic. The 2099 pack original is still my all time favorite dial for its simplicity and power. This dial is slick, but damn is it full of more text than I care to remember.
August 17, 2020
GL_Alex
Disposing Tiger Wylde gives you the opportunity to attack the top dog of your opponents team. 2 successful attacks will get you +6 plot points which if you have not used any PP yet should give you the 7 you need for One Nation under Doom. I got this guy in a blind booster and I'm pretty darn happy to be playing him.
July 23, 2020
Emtemss
Been waiting a long time to see this guy make his return, and honestly this does not disappoint. Easily my favourite title character so far released, for a large number of reasons. Not the least of which is that he feels like he will be great to play regardless of his title abilities. Ace keywords, decent stats, classic power set, and a return to a wild card Doom. The CyberPunk future of 2099 is now everyone.
